channel.title: CVE Feed for Apple -- iMovie
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Apple -- iMovie

item.title: CVE-2021-30757|2024-08-03T22:40:32.162Z -- apple -- imovie
item.description: This issue was addressed by enabling hardened runtime. This issue is fixed in iMovie 10.2.4. Entitlements and privacy permissions granted to this app may be used by a malicious app.
